meanings.definition: The act of detruding or thrusting out.
meanings.sent1: The detrusions of the tree roots broke through the concrete.
meanings.sent2: I noticed some detrusions on the surface of the water.
meanings.sent3: The detrusions in the cake made it look like a mini volcano.
meanings.sent4: Her detrusions of emotions were visible in her expressive eyes.
meanings.sent5: The detrusions of the mountain peaks against the sky were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Something that detrudes or thrusts out.
meanings.sent1: The little detrusions on the sculpture added a unique touch.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally stepped on a sharp detrusion on the path.
meanings.sent3: The detrusions on the hedgehog's back made it look like a spiky ball.
meanings.sent4: The detrusions of the building's design made it stand out in the cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The detrusions of the iceberg above the water were just the tip of the iceberg.
